name: Citrus Press Juicer
copy: I use this almost daily to squeeze lemon or lime juice over my chopped fresh fruit, to add some Vitamin C and brighten up the flavor.

name: Cutting Board
copy: Every kitchen needs several good cutting boards in a variety of different sizes.

name: Food Storage Container
copy: You will always need a good supply of food storage containers.

name: Instant Pot
copy: I use the Instant Pot to make my own Coconut Yogurt.  Much better and less expensive than store-bought.

name: Knife set
copy: Every cook needs a good set of knives.

name: Measuring Cups
copy: Another kitchen staple; a good set of measuring cups.

name: Measuring Spoons
copy: Every kitchen needs a good set of measuring spoons.

name: NutriBullet
copy: I use the NutriBullet 7 days a week.  I make my Almond Milk with it, smoothies, salad dressings - you name it.  It's a workhorse that has lasted several years already.

name: Nut Milk Bag
copy: You need one of these to make your own Nut Milk.  It couldn't be easier - just Google nut milk recipes and dive in.
